  • Package fang2.core

    • Class fang2.core.AnimationCanvas

      class AnimationCanvas extends JComponent implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • allTransformers
          Set<Transformer> allTransformers
          set of all installed transformers
        • allTransformersDirty
          boolean allTransformersDirty
          shared validity flag for allTransformers
        • aspect
          double aspect
          width/height aspect ratio
        • deferredAdd
          List<fang2.core.AnimationCanvas.DeferredSpriteAddElement> deferredAdd
          list of invalid input: '<'layer, sprite> pairs that have been added but are not yet actually on the canvas. Set to non-null, AnimationCanvas.holder, when traversing AnimationCanvas.sprites.
        • holder
          List<fang2.core.AnimationCanvas.DeferredSpriteAddElement> holder
          the real deferred add list; constructed once and then deferredAdd either points at it or not. Eliminates the call to new ArrayList before every traversal of AnimationCanvas.sprites.
        • reverseSprites
          HashMap<Sprite,Double> reverseSprites
          reverse map for sprites
        • sprites
          TreeMap<Double,LinkedHashSet<Sprite>> sprites
          the ordered collection of Sprites. The last added Sprite will appear on top.

    • Class fang2.core.FrameAdvancer

      class FrameAdvancer extends GameWindow implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • alarms
          TreeMap<Double,LinkedList<Alarm>> alarms
          all pending alarms
        • canvas
          AnimationCanvas canvas
          the canvas which displays the Sprites
        • currentTime
          double currentTime
          the current time, used in updateInterval method
        • maxModelTimeInterval
          double maxModelTimeInterval
          the highest allowable time between calls to update
        • refreshTimes
          LinkedList<Double> refreshTimes
          keeps track of the screen refresh rate
        • timeInterval
          double timeInterval
          time since the last call to updateInterval
        • timeOffset
          double timeOffset
          offset used for restarting the game

    • Class fang2.core.GameLoop

      class GameLoop extends FrameAdvancer implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • advancingToGameOver
          boolean advancingToGameOver
          whether the game should be proceeding to the game over screen or not
        • audible
          boolean audible
          field which can be used to mute/enable sound
        • client
          Client client
          used to stream keyboard/mouse information to/from the server/client
        • currentLevel
          GameLevel currentLevel
          the current level
        • gameName
          String gameName
          name of game
        • gameOver
          boolean gameOver
          whether the game is still going or has terminated
        • id
          int id
          which index belongs to this computer
        • levelIndex
          int levelIndex
          the current position in the levels ArrayList
        • levels
          ArrayList<GameLevel> levels
          the levels in the game
        • numPlayers
          int numPlayers
          number of payers
        • parameters
          Map<String,String> parameters
          this map is used to be able to set and get applet parameters without having to use the actual attributes in the tags
        • player
          Player[] player
          the array of players connected
        • random
          Random random
          used for random numbers
        • restarting
          boolean restarting
          whether the game should restart after the next advanceFrame method completes
        • server
          String server
          server name
        • sessionName
          String sessionName
          name of session

    • Class fang2.core.GameRedirection

      class GameRedirection extends GameLoop implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • activated
          boolean activated
        • addedGames
          ArrayList<Game> addedGames
        • currentGame
          Game currentGame
          used by the first game to call the correct advance method
        • finishingGame
          boolean finishingGame
        • firstGame
          Game firstGame
        • persistentAlarms
          HashSet<Alarm> persistentAlarms
          the alarms which will persist across levels. When a level ends all alarms in not in this collection will be cancelled.
        • persistentSounds
          HashSet<Sound> persistentSounds
          the sounds which will persist across levels. When a level ends all sounds not in this collection will be terminated.
        • persistentSprites
          HashSet<Sprite> persistentSprites
          the sprites which will persist across levels. When a level ends all sprites in not in this collection will be removed from the canvas.
        • restarting
          boolean restarting
        • upcomingGames
          ArrayList<Game> upcomingGames
